SELECT DISTINCT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.WHETHER_SALES, B.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.RENAMED_FILENAME, B.READCOUNT, M1.ID as WRITER FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M1 ON B.MNO = M1.MNO WHERE B.DTYPE = '${dtype}'
AND B.WRITER LIKE '%${writer}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND( b.title like '%${all}%' OR b.content like '%${all}%' OR b.writer like '%${all}%' )
ORDER BY B.BNO DESC LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B.BNO) FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M1 ON B.MNO = M1.MNO WHERE B.DTYPE = '${dtype}'
AND M1.ID LIKE '%${writer}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND( b.title like '%${all}%' OR b.content like '%${all}%' OR m1.id like '%${all}%' )

SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, M.ID AS WRITER, B.READCOUNT, B.DTYPE, B.WHETHER_SALES, B.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.RENAMED_FILENAME, B.CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, R.RNO AS R_RNO, R.BNO AS R_BNO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, M2.IMAGE AS R_profileImg, M2.ID AS R_WRITER, R.CREATE_DATE AS R_CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE AS R_MODIFY_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON (B.BNO = R.BNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (R.MNO = M2.MNO) WHERE B.BNO = #{bNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( BNO, MNO, TITLE, CONTENT, DTYPE, WHETHER_SALES, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, READCOUNT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( 0, #{mNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{dtype}, #{whetherSales}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO REPLY( RNO, BNO, MNO, WRITER, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES( 0, #{bNo}, #{mNo}, #{writer}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
